23 #ifndef HardwareSerial_h
24 #define HardwareSerial_h
25 
26 
27 #include <inttypes.h>
28 
29 #include "Stream.h"
30 #include "applicationMessageHeaders/AppMessages.h"
31 
32 
33 
34 // Define constants and variables for buffering incoming serial data. We're
35 // using a ring buffer (I think), in which head is the index of the location
36 // to which to write the next incoming character and tail is the index of the
37 // location from which to read.
38 #if (RAMEND < 1000)
39  #define SERIAL_BUFFER_SIZE 16
40 #else
41  // Probably overkill here, but just ensureing that there is room
42  // for a max message + length, + SOF and EOF
43  #define SERIAL_BUFFER_SIZE (APP_MSG_MAX_LENGTH + 3)
44 #endif
45 
46 struct ring_buffer
47 {
48  unsigned char buffer[SERIAL_BUFFER_SIZE];
49  volatile unsigned int head;
50  volatile unsigned int tail;
51 };
52 
53 
54 class HardwareSerial : public Stream
55 {
56  protected:
57  ring_buffer *_rx_buffer;
58  ring_buffer *_tx_buffer;
59  volatile uint8_t *_ubrrh;
60  volatile uint8_t *_ubrrl;
61  volatile uint8_t *_ucsra;
62  volatile uint8_t *_ucsrb;
63  volatile uint8_t *_ucsrc;
64  volatile uint8_t *_udr;
65  uint8_t _rxen;
66  uint8_t _txen;
67  uint8_t _rxcie;
68  uint8_t _udrie;
69  uint8_t _u2x;
70  bool transmitting;
71 
72 
73 
74  public:
75  HardwareSerial(ring_buffer *rx_buffer, ring_buffer *tx_buffer,
76  volatile uint8_t *ubrrh, volatile uint8_t *ubrrl,
77  volatile uint8_t *ucsra, volatile uint8_t *ucsrb,
78  volatile uint8_t *ucsrc, volatile uint8_t *udr,
79  uint8_t rxen, uint8_t txen, uint8_t rxcie, uint8_t udrie, uint8_t u2x);
80  virtual void begin(unsigned long);
81  virtual void begin(unsigned long, uint8_t);
82  virtual void end();
83  virtual int available(void);
84  virtual int peek(void);
85  virtual int read(void);
86  virtual void flush(void);
87  virtual size_t write(uint8_t);
88  inline size_t write(unsigned long n) { return write((uint8_t)n); }
89  inline size_t write(long n) { return write((uint8_t)n); }
90  inline size_t write(unsigned int n) { return write((uint8_t)n); }
91  inline size_t write(int n) { return write((uint8_t)n); }
92  using Print::write; // pull in write(str) and write(buf, size) from Print
93  operator bool();
94 };
95

97 // Define config for Serial.begin(baud, config);
98 #define SERIAL_5N1 0x00
99 #define SERIAL_6N1 0x02
100 #define SERIAL_7N1 0x04
101 #define SERIAL_8N1 0x06
102 #define SERIAL_5N2 0x08
103 #define SERIAL_6N2 0x0A
104 #define SERIAL_7N2 0x0C
105 #define SERIAL_8N2 0x0E
106 #define SERIAL_5E1 0x20
107 #define SERIAL_6E1 0x22
108 #define SERIAL_7E1 0x24
109 #define SERIAL_8E1 0x26
110 #define SERIAL_5E2 0x28
111 #define SERIAL_6E2 0x2A
112 #define SERIAL_7E2 0x2C
113 #define SERIAL_8E2 0x2E
114 #define SERIAL_5O1 0x30
115 #define SERIAL_6O1 0x32
116 #define SERIAL_7O1 0x34
117 #define SERIAL_8O1 0x36
118 #define SERIAL_5O2 0x38
119 #define SERIAL_6O2 0x3A
120 #define SERIAL_7O2 0x3C
121 #define SERIAL_8O2 0x3E
122
